00019 /** \file
00020  \brief Megasquirt proxy
00021 */
00022 
00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 #include <string.h>
00026 #include <time.h>
00027 #include <sys/time.h>
00028 
00029 #include "datasource.h"
00030 #include "obdservicecommands.h"
00031 
00032 // http://www.diyautotune.com/megamanual/xFAQ/manuals/COM_RS232.htm
00033 
00034 /// The void * generator for megasquirt
00035 struct megasquirt_gen {
00036     int fd; //< Pointer to the open serial port
00037 };
00038 
00039 const char *megasquirt_simgen_name() {
00040     return "Megasquirt";
00041 }
00042 
00043 const char *megasquirt_simgen_longdesc() {
00044     return "Talk to a megasquirt device\n"
00045         "Seed: <path-to-config-file>";
00046 }
00047 
00048 int megasquirt_simgen_create(void **gen, const char *seed) {
00049     if(NULL == seed || '\0' == *seed) {
00050         fprintf(stderr, "Megasquirt generator needs the config file as a seed\n");
00051         return 1;
00052     }
00053 
00054     struct megasquirt_gen *g = (struct megasquirt_gen *)malloc(sizeof(struct megasquirt_gen));
00055     if(NULL == g) {
00056         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't allocate memory for megasquirt generator\n");
00057         return 1;
00058     }
00059 
00060     return 0;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void megasquirt_simgen_destroy(void *gen) {
00064     free(gen);
00065 }
00066 
00067 int megasquirt_simgen_getvalue(void *gen, unsigned int mode, unsigned int PID, unsigned int *A, unsigned int *B, unsigned int *C, unsigned int *D) {
00068 
00069     struct megasquirt_gen *g = (struct megasquirt_gen *)gen;
00070 
00071     return -1; // Shouldn't be able to get here
00072 }
00073 
00074 int megasquirt_simgen_idle(void *gen, int idlems) {
00075     return 0;
00076 }
00077 
00078 // Declare our obdsim_generator. This is pulled in as an extern in obdsim.c
00079 struct obdsim_generator obdsimgen_megasquirt = {
00080     megasquirt_simgen_name,
00081     megasquirt_simgen_longdesc,
00082     megasquirt_simgen_create,
00083     megasquirt_simgen_destroy,
00084     megasquirt_simgen_getvalue,
00085     megasquirt_simgen_idle,
00086     NULL,
00087     NULL
00088 };
